remarks: The limit of the cumulative distribution function is one.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Feb-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Jul-2017.)
statement:
dstfrv.1 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) $.
dstfrv.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) $.
dstfrv.3 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. RR |-> ( P ` ( X oRVC <_ x ) ) ) ) $.
dstfrvclim1 $p |- ( ph -> F ~~> 1 ) $.
$d P x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
